whatIsEPGDescription: EPG (Electronic Program Guide) is an electronic program guide that displays information about current and upcoming TV shows.
downloadEPGMessage: Global EPG guide download will start. This operation may take a few minutes.
refreshEPGMessage: Do you want to refresh all EPG data?
clearCacheMessage: This action will delete all cached EPG data. It will need to be redownloaded.
cacheClearedMessage: EPG cache cleared successfully!\n\nAll cached EPG data has been deleted. You can now download new data.
epgGlobalHelpText: üì° Automatic fallback solution: Download a global TV guide that automatically applies to all your playlists that don\'t have integrated EPG. Ideal when your playlists don\'t provide a TV guide.
manualEPGHelpText: Manage your manual EPG sources and assign them to specific playlists to optimize TV guide accuracy.
confirmDeleteSource: Are you sure you want to delete
invalidUrl: Invalid URL. Use http:// or https://
addCustomEPGSources: Add custom EPG sources to enrich your TV guides
noManualEPGSourcesAvailable: No manual EPG sources available.\nAdd them from the "Manual EPG Sources" screen.
integratedOrGlobalEPG: Integrated or global EPG based on availability
epgAssignmentHelp:
Assign specific EPG sources to your playlists.

EPG Priority:
1. Integrated EPG (url-tvg)
2. Manually assigned source
3. Global EPG (fallback)
importPlaylistsToSee: Import M3U or Xtream playlists to see them here
addPlaylistsToSee: Add playlists to see them here
confirmDeletePlaylist: Are you sure you want to delete this playlist?
pleaseEnterPlaylistName: Please give a name to your playlist
noActivePlaylistDesc: ‚ÑπÔ∏è No active playlist. Import a playlist to configure visible groups.
